00023 #ifndef _CTK_ENV_H
00024 #define _CTK_ENV_H

00030 #include "ctk_types.h"
00031 
00032 #define CTK_ENV_MAGIC   0xce11cafe
00033 
00034 /* system environments */
00035 #define CTK_ENV_ID_MAGIC    0   
00036 #define CTK_ENV_ID_VERSION  1   
00037 #define CTK_ENV_ID_TIMEBASE 2   
00038 #define CTK_ENV_ID_GID      3   
00039 #define CTK_ENV_ID_RANK     4   
00040 #define CTK_ENV_ID_ENVP     5   
00041 #define CTK_ENV_ID_RSV1     6   
00042 #define CTK_ENV_ID_TASKINFO 6   
00044 #define CTK_ENV_ID_BASE     7   
00045 #define CTK_ENV_ID_MAX     15  
00047 #define CTK_ENV_MAX      16  
00052 typedef ctk_val64_t ctk_env_value_t;
00053 
00057 typedef struct {
00058     ctk_env_value_t env[CTK_ENV_MAX] __attribute__((aligned(128)));
00059 } ctk_env_t __attribute__((aligned(128)));
